Text:
seems to work
the whole thing has a bit of a creepy feeling though, kinda as if you are some pedofile (nothing wrong with that i guess) showing off with his collection of cheap indian girls

goddamnusername, ... thank you for your input as regards to my seeding, but why did you feel the need to turn offensive?
Is taking photographs of young girls dancing considered paediophilia?
If that is your mindset, then you have a BIG problem my friend!
Also, your eyes must be pretty bloodshot. This beautiful young lady is NOT Indian; ... she is Thai, and I take serious offence at your comment that she is cheap!
I suggest you crawl back up to the bar and get yourself another bottle, and whilst you're there, ask the barperson for a copy of the book on good manners.
I'll say it.... FUCK YOU AND YOUR GOOK SHIT!!!
